Summary: GoPro Hero camera setup for timelapse. Reviewed the footage and found an orange orb.
divs: Sighting DetailsSetup a GoPro Hero camera on the front steps of the house to capture the lightning. Reviewed the footage to find out that I came up empty handed with any good lightning strikes. Near the end of the filming I noticed that I caught an orange orb that is yet to be explained. (the storm had passed by the time this orb had appeared)
trends: There has been one other sighting in Huntsville
There were no other sightings in Huntsville on or around August 5th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
